product_name: Rossignol X6 Combi Cross-Country Ski Boots
long_description: Rossignol X6 Combi cross-country ski boots give ambitious Nordic skiers the ability to classic ski one day and skate ski the next with a single pair of boots. Hinged cuffs with power straps provide good support, yet don't limit mobility. Inner boots mold to match the contours of your feet as you ski for maximum comfort and control. RC3 soles have a flex that is specifically tuned for both classic and skate skiing; compatible with NNN bindings. Rossignol X6 Combi cross-country ski boots have zippered outer boots that keep laces free of snow and ice. High cuffs help keep cold air and snow out.
short_description: Rossignol X6 Combi cross-country ski boots give ambitious Nordic skiers the ability to classic ski one day and skate ski the next with a single pair of boots.
